title: instant feedback??
body: Hello, i was away from my computer with the client open, and when i came back i found a window with title "instant feedback" that says something about me.. leaving or something i don't really understood what it said.. what is it??? i didn't went afk in a game or anything..o.O

replies.body:
Hmm... It's pretty tough for me to tell what the message was without seeing it. I don't see anything on your account that immediately shouts out to me that it was potentially a reason for the message.

If you have any more information or screenshots to share, please let me know.
